q1.question: How do I place an order?
q1.answer: To place an order, browse our catalog, add books to your cart, then click the cart icon to proceed to checkout. Follow the steps to finalize your purchase.

q2.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
q2.answer: You can modify or cancel your order within 24 hours of validation. Contact us quickly by email or phone with your order number.

q3.question: How do I track my order?
q3.answer: Log in to your account and access the "Order History" page. In the "Current Orders" section, you can track your order status in real time.

q1.question: What are the delivery times?
q1.answer: Delivery times vary between 2 to 5 business days.

q2.question: What are the shipping costs?
q2.answer: Delivery is free for any order over 7000DA. Below that, shipping costs are 400DA.

q1.question: What is your return policy?
q1.answer: You have 3 days after receipt to return an item in perfect condition. Return costs are your responsibility unless the product is defective.

q2.question: How do I make a return?
q2.answer: Contact our customer service to obtain a return authorization. Return the item in its original packaging with the invoice. Refund occurs within 2 days after receipt.

q3.question: Can I exchange a book?
q3.answer: Yes, exchanges are possible under the same conditions as returns. Specify the desired book in exchange when making your request.

q1.question: How do I create an account?
q1.answer: Click the user icon at the top of the page and follow the instructions to create your account. You will benefit from order tracking and exclusive offers.

q2.question: What are the benefits of having an account?
q2.answer: With an account, you can view your order history and track their status in real time, add books to your favorites, and benefit from exclusive discounts reserved for our members.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept CIB and el-dhahabia cards.

q1.question: Are the books new?
q1.answer: All our books are new and come directly from official publishers or distributors. We guarantee the quality of our products.

q2.question: Do you offer digital books?
q2.answer: Currently, we focus on physical books. Digital books will soon be available on our platform.

q3.question: How do pre-orders work?
q3.answer: Pre-orders allow you to reserve a book before its release. You will only be charged upon shipment, and you will receive the book as soon as it is available.

team.missionText: At Esprit Livre, we want to make reading and books "cool" and desirable again in the age of short attention span content. Why? We unite creativity, technology and passion to build a platform that makes people want to read, discover and share books as a true lifestyle.
